Cardiovascular Diseases/Vascular Diseases/Myocardial Ischemia/Coronary Disease/Coronary Stenosis/Coronary Restenosis
Record.Description: Recurrent narrowing or constriction of a coronary artery following surgical procedures performed to alleviate a prior obstruction.
